Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Glenwood
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Glenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Glenwood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland and X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to rally and march.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to rally and march.

  • Northbound buses will operate via Jackson, Halsted, Grand, and Ashland.
  • Southbound buses will operate via Ashland, Grand, Halsted, Van Buren, and Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Chestnut
ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses rrtd NB via State, Ontario, Dearborn Chicago & State; SB via State, Chicago, Clark, Ohio & State due to police activity near State/Chestnut.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How doe s this affect my trip?

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near State/Chestnut.

  • Northbound buses will operate via via State, Chicago, Dearborn, Walton, Clark, then resume their normal route.
  • Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Chicago, State, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
